name: py-summer
short_description: Summer is light weight Python 3 application framework to support some common tasks in variety of applications. It tries to assist you with business object management, helps with ORM (mapping, transactions), LDAP, AOP, localization, config files and such aka famous Java Spring Framework, but much more simple.
summary: Summer is light weight Python 3 application framework
